title: Senior Sales Manager
content:
Amsterdam
We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Sales Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong network within the Dutch media agency landscape and a proven track record of developing and maintaining relationships with key decision-makers within these agencies. A deep understanding of the (online) Media/Advertising ecosystem is a must. The Sales Manager will be responsible for developing and executing sales strategies, identifying new business opportunities, and delivering on sales targets.
Responsibilities:

Develop and maintain relationships with existing clients and agencies
Identify new business opportunities
Provide a strong consulting dimension and a high-quality service
Propose relevant media recommendations adapted to your clients' needs
Work in close collaboration with the various internal areas of expertise (Insights, Creative Studio, Account Management, Platform) in order to best meet client requirements
Ensure sales targets are met

Qualifications:

5+ years of experience in selling media to media agencies
Strong network within the Dutch media agency landscape
Excellent relationship-building and interpersonal skills
Proven ability to close deals
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Native Dutch speaker is prefered
Knowledge of online video solutions

Benefits:

Competitive salary and benefits package
Opportunity to work with a talented team of professionals
Chance to make a significant impact on the company's growth
Challenging and rewarding work environment
We offer a hybrid work model

If you are a highly motivated and experienced Digital Advertising Sales Manager with a strong network within the Dutch media agency landscape, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
About Teads
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omnichannel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media.
As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies. For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers.
Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries.
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
